mapper.insert: insert into tbl_approval (no,status,title, content, writer, writer_name, receiver,receiver_dname, curr_approval, next_approval,filename) values (tbl_approval_seq.nextval, #{status},#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{writer_name},#{receiver},#{receiver_dname},#{curr_approval},#{next_approval},#{filename})
mapper.select: select deptno from tbl_emp where empno=#{empno}
select no, status, writer, writer_name, receiver_dname, receiver, title,content, curr_approval,next_approval, filename from tbl_approval where no=#{no}
select dname from tbl_dept where deptno=#{deptno}
select manager from tbl_emp where empno=#{empno}
select deptno, dname from tbl_dept where deptno!=#{deptno} and deptno!=0 order by deptno

select distinct empno, ename, tbl_emp.position from tbl_emp,tbl_position where tbl_emp.position=tbl_position.position and (tbl_emp.deptno=(select deptno from tbl_emp where empno=#{empno}) and tbl_position.posno < (select posno from tbl_emp, tbl_position where tbl_emp.position=tbl_position.position and tbl_emp.empno=#{empno}))
or tbl_emp.empno=1000
order by empno desc
